mapper.delete: update sys_menu set del_flag = 0 where menu_id = #{value}
mapper.select: select distinct m.menu_id , parent_id, `name`, url, perms,`type`,icon,order_num,create_time, update_time,del_flag from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id =ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{id} and m.type in(0,1,2) and m.del_flag = 1 order by m.order_num

select distinct m.menu_id , parent_id, `name`, url, perms,`type`,icon,order_num,create_time, update_time,del_flag from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id =ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{id} and m.type in(0,1,2) and m.del_flag = 1 and m.menu_type = 1 order by m.order_num

select distinct m.menu_id , parent_id, `name`, url, perms,`type`,icon,order_num,create_time, update_time,del_flag,redirect from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id =ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{id} and m.type in(0,1,2) and m.del_flag = 1 and m.menu_type = 0 order by m.order_num

select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{id} and m.del_flag = 1 and m.menu_type = 1
